description:
Yamato is the daughter of Kaido of the Four Emperors and proclaims to be "Kozuki Oden". This profound admiration for the legendary samurai has led Yamato to embody everything related to the samurai to the extent of proclaiming to be a man as well, and Yamato is widely referred to as Kaido`s son.
Source: One Piece Wiki
name: Yamato
